metadata.name: Games with Characters I
metadata.description:
VASILIY RYABCHENKO x SERGIUS 

**«Games with Characters»** is a collection of digital reproductions of the artworks by the famous Ukrainian artist, [**Vasily Ryabchenko**](https://vasiliyryabchenko.com/), painted in the 80s and 90s. Using canvas, brush and oil, the artist, with his inherent softness and depth, conveys the very sweet, all-embracing feeling of attraction between two lovers.

The musical composition, **«Etude n.13»**, written by the young artist [**SERGIUS**](https://foundation.app/@sergius), combined with the smooth animation, brings beautiful movement and life to the image.

Love and be loved.

1608 × 1868 
15 sec animated video with audio

© 2022
